story.kicker_image_caption: Shah Rukh Khan took his daughter Suhana out for dinner on Wednesday
story.storykicker: SRK arrived soon enough, his casual cool mood highlighted by a bandana on the forehead. What made heads turned, though, was the lady accompanying him. Shah Rukh arrived at dinner with his pretty teenager daughter Suhana.
story.storybody:
The buzz at the fine-dining bar and kitchen in suburban Mumbai on Wednesday night was palpable. It's not every day that Shah Rukh Khan turns up for dinner at a restaurant, after all, and he had made reservations for two. This, while wife Gauri was away shopping in London.

SRK arrived soon enough, his casual cool mood highlighted by a bandana on the forehead. What made heads turned, though, was the lady accompanying him. Shah Rukh arrived at dinner with his pretty teenager daughter Suhana.

WAITING FOR A GLANCE

News, of course, travels fast. By the time the fatherdaughter duo had finished dinner, enough fans and press photographers had gathered outside the restaurant to cause a mini traffic jam in the area. Quite graciously, SRK stopped to have a few quick words with some of his little fans who were trying to reach out to him from among the crowd. He even posed for a couple of selfies before getting into his car and speeding off.

Sources said SRK took Suhana out for dinner in order to spend some quality time with her. The dinner affair it seems was part of some time that the superstar has taken off over the past week, to spend with his daughter amid his hectic schedule. Suhana celebrated her 16th birthday on May 22, and has been in town for a while.

Also see: SEE PICS: Shah Rukh Khan's dinner date with daughter Suhana

story.shortheadline: Daddy-daughter dinner date: Shah Rukh Khan takes Suhana out to spend some quality time

briefcase_content.briefcase: Shah Rukh Khan and daughter Suhana were spotted at a restaurant.
The actor also interacted with his fans.
